resources.string: Please fill in the request information
You have not finished all the information!
You have not answered all the questions!
The next test will be based on your information
Choose the items by clicking on the word after the circle \n \u3000\u3000 19 in total
copy to clipboard and search for it

string-array.name: question
string-array.item: 3. Please choose your weight condition,use body mass indexBMI(BMI=weight(kg)/height(m)^2.automatic selection)
8. How many years do you smoke?
12. Do you drink?if you drink ,how much you drink every day?
13. Do you drink coffee every day ?
14. Do you drink milk or yoghourt and so on dairy products every day?
15. Do you usually have meat ?which meat do you eat?(red meat refers to cattle and sheep,rabit meat fish,poultry meat.specially processed meat refers to smoked,roasted,fried,pickled meat)
16. How much fruit do you eat every day?
17. How many kinds of fruits do you eat every week?
18. How much vegetables do you eat every day?
19. How many kinds of vegetables do you eat every week?

string-array.name: answer5
string-array.item: middle school education(junior high school or senior high school)

string-array.name: answer6
string-array.item: low income family(or enjoy minimum living standard)

string-array.name: answer7
string-array.item: less than a packet( 20 cigaratters)every day

string-array.name: answer8
string-array.item: never smoke or less than six years

string-array.name: answer10
string-array.item: moderate strength physical activity(include cut it,ride on a bicycle,horticulture)

string-array.name: answer12
string-array.item: not drink or less than six ml every day
nearly 25 ml of wine a day

string-array.name: answer15
string-array.item: just eat white meat,seldom eat red meat
eat more red meat,but not specially processed
eat the flesh of varieties is complex, including red meat,white meat
often eat barbecue, smoked, fried and salted meat
